entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
